thread.title: Joe Scarborough Praises Fox’s Shep Smith for Response to Trump: ‘Shep Kicks Ass’
thread.title_full: Joe Scarborough Praises Fox’s Shep Smith for Response to Trump: ‘Shep Kicks Ass’

author: Josh Feldman
title: Joe Scarborough Praises Fox’s Shep Smith for Response to Trump: ‘Shep Kicks Ass’
text:
Joe Scarborough Praises Fox’s Shep Smith for Response to Trump: ‘Shep Kicks Ass’ by Josh Feldman | 5:57   
Fox’s Shep Smith has been very tough on the Trump administration recently–– to the point where fans of other Fox programs have taken to Twitter to express their negative feelings . He’s defended CNN multiple times after attacks from President Trump , said “there’s been a lot of lying” from the White House , and just this week said he’s stopped quoting Kellyanne Conway “because, well, history.” 
And now today, Smith said on-air that Fox News cannot confirm “commentary” by the network’s own Judge Andrew Napolitano on British intel agency GCHQ surveilling Trump for Barack Obama . 
This earned Smith some plaudits from MSNBC competitor Joe Scarborough : "Fox News know of no evidence of any kind."Shep kicks ass. Full stop. https://t.co/wNEwwinlH4 
— Joe Scarborough (@JoeNBC) March 17, 2017 
Scarborough too has been alarmed at the White House over this new claim: It is beneath the dignity of the White House to churn out fraudulent conspiracy theories that trash our special relationship with Britain. https://t.co/fiqpxEA1wJ 
— Joe Scarborough (@JoeNBC) March 17, 2017 First Great Britain. Now Germany. All to defend a lie that the entire world knows is a lie. https://t.co/SfwUXblkPW 
— Joe Scarborough (@JoeNBC) March 17, 2017 Of course you don't. Because it's only our most important alliance, after all. https://t.co/rxzxYnndQV 
— Joe Scarborough (@JoeNBC) March 17, 2017 
[ image via screengrab ]
